column4: samba help please .. --> how do i find the //servername/sharename of a windows computer?
what do you mean? network:/// will show you the network resources...
it just shows the windows network.. and when i double click.. nothing is under it
well that's what i mean :). strange that sometimes it does and sometimes it doesn't...
what do you want to do?
i have a windows computer on my network.. i want to access its share folder
the workgroup name is called WORKGROUP
and the computer name is .. seedbox i think
have you tried using it directly? (smb://seddbox)
the wokrgroup is called WORKGROUP and the computer is called seedbox or seedbox. .. im not sure.. but i know its one of those (i am looking atthe windows computer)
